verbs.description: [ARG1: oklahoma city new convention center] [V: is] [ARG2: about to erect steel the four - level maps 3 convention center should begin rising from the ground this month] the oklahoma city city council will vote tuesday on final foundation upgrades as five months of moving dirt and installing utilities gives way to erecting steel for the city largest - ever building project we 've had several years of not hearing too much about work orders at the convention center so getting under way is really a great thing said tom mcdaniel who chairs the maps 3 citizens advisory board and the board convention center subcommittee the proposal being considered tuesday is to spend 824 400 to strengthen the building foundation for an additional elevator and enclosure of the loading dock with tuesday tom mcdaniel citizens advisory board football convention center omni hotels resorts omni hotels convention flintco oklahoma city flintco llc developer
